definitions.definition: Happening by turns; one following the other in succession of time or place; first one and then the other (repeatedly).

subdefinitions.definition: Alternating; (of e.g. a pair of tinctures which a charge is coloured) succeeding in turns, or (relative to the field) counterchanged .

definitions.definition: Designating the members in a series, which regularly intervene between the members of another series, as the odd or even numbers of the numerals; every other; every second.

examples: Hyperlinked text is displayed in alternate color in a Web browser.
He lives in an alternate universe and an alternate reality.

definitions.definition: Distributed singly at different heights of the stem, and at equal intervals as respects angular divergence
examples: Many trees have alternate leaf arrangement (e.g. birch, oak and mulberry).

main_definition: Happening by turns; one following the other in succession of time or place; first one and then the other (repeatedly).
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) Designating the members in a series, which regularly intervene between the members of another series, as the odd or even numbers of the numerals; every other; every second.
( botany , of leaves ) Distributed singly at different heights of the stem, and at equal intervals as respects angular divergence
